sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import Swal from 'sweetalert2'; import { UserService } from '../services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-address', templateUrl: './address.component.html', styleUrls: ['./address.component.css'] }) export class AddressComponent { constructor(private userService: UserService, private router: Router) { } onRegister(registerForm: any) { this.userService.registerUser(registerForm.value).subscribe(response => { this.registerSuccess(); this.router.navigate(['/login']) }) } registerSuccess() { Swal.fire({ title: 'Thank you...', text: 'Registeration succesfully!', icon: 'success', }); } }
